response.original_title: Meer ku'j d'r niet van maek'n
response.overview: In the early 1990s, a joke in a Dutch pub in Tuk unexpectedly grew into a nationwide hit. Mannenkoor Karrespoor suddenly found itself on major stages, on television, and on the radio. For the down-to-earth men from the Kop van Overijssel, it was a strange new world—one they tried to navigate while keeping both feet firmly on the ground. When money and success enter the picture, the men face a dilemma: how do you make sure that a joke that spiraled out of control is still something to look back on fondly 35 years later?  The film weaves together rich archival footage with the present day, as the choir members reflect on their extraordinary journey at their regular table in Café De Karre. The viewer joins Mannenkoor Karrespoor and follows them as they write a new song for the first time since the 1990s and prepare for their anniversary show.
response.title: Meer ku'j d'r niet van maek'n
